function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Discrepancy between predicted and measured energy use","Impact":"Inaccurate energy performance can lead to inefficient building operation and higher energy costs","Mitigation":"Regular energy performance audits and adjustments based on actual building usage","Technologies":"Energy monitoring systems, smart building technology","People":"Building owners, facility managers","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Misrepresentation of building performance in green building assessments","Impact":"Loss of trust in green building standards and investments","Mitigation":"Independent third-party verification of building performance, regular updates of assessment methods","Technologies":"Data analytics, performance monitoring tools","People":"Investors, building owners, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Green building assessment organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of environmental performance issues in assessment methods","Impact":"Failure to address environmental impact and contribute to climate change","Mitigation":"Incorporation of comprehensive environmental impact criteria, regular review and update of assessment methods","Technologies":"Environmental impact assessment tools, climate modeling software","People":"Environmental experts, assessment method developers","Owner":"Green building assessment organizations"}]}
